alert.note: Alert for Southwest Highlands; Upper Treasure Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 2:53PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Elmore and east central Owyhee Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 253 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Winter Camp Butte, or 26 miles southwest of Glenns Ferry, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bruneau Canyon Viewpoint around 310 PM MDT. Pot Hole Butte around 320 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
